column5: This scheme is suited to most home or desktop computers that are left plugged in all the time.
column7: This scheme is designed for extended battery life for portable computers on the road.
column9: This scheme keeps the monitor on for doing presentations.
column11: This scheme keeps the computer running so that it can be accessed from the network.  Use this scheme if you do not have network wakeup hardware.
column13: This scheme keeps the computer on and optimizes it for high performance.
column15: This scheme is extremely aggressive for saving power.
